choices: Renri mitha the flat as a washboard fighter
Rakgu the clerical orc who thinks he a halfling
1.content: the great rune lands of Sven desert have attracted adventurers of all stripes and merits since the fall of abelonia three hundred years prior. You are a novice adventurer having just arrived. Pray tell good sir or lady who are you
1.title: The legend begins

choices: Renri refuses to answer and threatens the peacekeepers
Renri tells the peacekeepers about the infuriating narrator
12.content: Renri mitha a rather tall woman standing at 5'11" with an ego twice as large and temper to match. Though a novice adventurer she is not stranger to fight seeing as most people who mock her lack of sex appeal end up with a black eye. Though she is of noble descent temperance and patience we're lost on her. Renri said " when I find that narrator I'll be sure to cut him to ribbons" now renri shouldn't you find a tavern for the night. Renri replied "right after I shove my long sord up your ass" Renri spent 4 hours looking for the narrator before the local authorities brought her in for questioning
12.title: Renri mitha the flat as a washboard fighter

123.content:
Renri tries to lie however Renri rolls a critical failure she is hung by the peace keepers in the morning
DEAD END
but that made no sense why did they hang her. She rolled a one and was very aggressive towards the narrator
123.title: Renri feigns ignorance

info.brief_description: Fantasy with little rules or guidance created by boredom
info.description: Ultimately decided one night to create an open interactive with little to no guidance and see where this goes. the only guidance and rules im making is has to be fantasy and use the three characters provided erotica is allowed and character deaths are very much encouraged. The only reason a chapter may be deleted is if it's only one sentence long.
info.pretty_title: Very much so a fantasy story
